title: ITC Hotels could take up to 15 months to get listed: MD Sanjiv Puri
description: ITC chief Sanjiv Puri said listing of the proposed demerged hotel entity, ITC Hotels, will take 12-15 months to complete the regulatory process, while the shareholding structure of the company will provide stability to the hotels business and allow ITC to leverage the institutional strengths to build its fast-moving consumer goods (FMCG) business.
